website_summaries.verdict: An excellent tool that delivers powerful performance.
pros: Soft start prevents the bit from jumping out of position
AutoMax Dial Speed Control allows maximizing speed
Very quiet for a rotary hammer
Effective, easy, and comfortable to operate
cons: Corded, thus not easy to move around

customer_reviews.title: Made in Germany, last for a year....so disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Made in Germany, great....but less than a year problems happened. Hammer hit but not turning on hammer drill mode, have to switch it back and forth to get it engages and when I use the drill for more than 5 minutes to drill some hole onto the concrete then sound like the clutch was stripped....now only use it as the scraper or chisel. My last Bosch last for 15 years, I would expect with technology this day it must improve to this newer version but it’s not. Be careful guys. I’m a contractor and building homes for over 25 years. I have encountered with many brand name tools... Bosch tools wasn’t use to be anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bigboble

customer_reviews.title: Best price ive found
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace our old one at work. This was the best priced. Old one lasted us for years on the jobsite.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Robbins

customer_reviews.title: What a good deal when comparing the price at Lowe's
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad, who is a plumber. What a good deal when comparing the price at Lowe's. He has had no complaints, and has been using it for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Anah

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an old Milwaulkee spline rotary hammer. It has plenty of power, lightweight, and changing bits is very easy. I like the soft start, and the fact that you can rotate the position of the bit. The anti-vibration handle makes it comfortable to use. All controls are easy to access and the cord is a good workable length. In hammering mode the switch locks on so you don't have to hold it. I Would definetly reccomend this tool. I also purchased the spline shank to SDS adapter so I can use either type bit. Shipping time was fast.
customer_reviews.author: HOWIE V.S.N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: ground rod driver
customer_reviews.text: please somebody can tell me what is the correct ground rod driver, cause i`ve tried some models and just did not works as hs1824
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to drilling this drill has the power to drill through concrete filled cinder block its very durable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Never had a hammer drill with soft start before. It makes it easy to start a bit where you want to drill. Plenty of power, great tool!
customer_reviews.author: joyful50

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, good power and the slow start helps to keep the bit from jumping out of position.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog 504

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely satisfied. I bought this model because it is made in Germany. I won't purchase made in China. Hear that Bosch?
customer_reviews.author: Shane Neuhaus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drill, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bosch Hammerdrill I've owned, awesome drill, tough as hell, easy on the hands. Yeah. I'll be back.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great power for the size
customer_reviews.text: Great power for the size and works with all my bits. It replaced my older Bosch that worked hard for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rogers

product_meta.title: Bosch 11265EVS 1-5/8 Spline Combination Hammer
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Unmatched Power to Weight Ratio - 13 Amps, 8.1 ft-lbs Impact energy & 14.3 lbs – Best performing rotary hammer in its class!
feature_bullets: Unmatched Power to Weight ratio - 13-Amp, 8.1-Feet lbs Impact Energy and 14.3-Pound - Best Performing Rotary Hammer in its class
Active vibration control - vibration reduction in the hammer mechanism and the grip area provides maximum user comfort for extended periods of work
Constant response circuitry - maintains speed under load and overload protection
Turbo power - delivers 20-Percent more power in hammer only mode
Auto-max speed dial - ensures maximum speed every time the tool is turned on

specifications.Warranty Description: 1 Year warranty and 30 day money back guarantee
